game.name: Protect Larry
game.shortDescription: Your pet duck Larry is your only hope to save Pine Valley. Protect him at all costs! Switch between tactical command and third-person combat as you lead your troops through dynamic battles, changing terrain, and fierce weather.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your pet duck Larry is your only hope to save Pine Valley. Protect him at all costs! Switch between tactical command and third-person combat as you lead your troops through dynamic battles, changing terrain, and fierce weather.
